abstract: Cisco Systems said on Tuesday that it would acquire Cognio, a company specializing in analyzing and controlling wireless networks, in the latest in a string of company purchases. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems said on Tuesday that it would acquire Cognio, a company specializing in analyzing and controlling wireless networks, in the latest in a string of company purchases. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

headline.main: Cisco to Acquire Wireless Services Provider Cognio
